JUMBOTRON.TITLE: Whatever you are like, we travel with you

INFO.TEXT_ONE: Explore new adventures and amazing destinations. Find travel companions who share your passion for discovering the world.
INFO.TEXT_TWO: Plan your next trip with ease. Connect with people heading in the same direction.
INFO.TEXT_THREE: Share your experiences and create unforgettable memories with fellow travelers like you.

MI_PERFIL.TITLE: My Profile
MI_PERFIL.SUBTITLE: In this section, you can modify the personal information shown to others, as well as your travel preferences. You will also have the option to verify your data.
